articles.author: Sam Clark
articles.title: Georgia’s new pro-Russia president inaugurated amid protests - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The ruling Georgian Dream party has halted talks on joining the EU.
articles.content: Meanwhile, his pro-EU predecessor, Salome Zourabichvili, has insisted she wont stand aside. Zourabichvili on Saturday joined thousands of people across the country in forming human chains to protest … [+1065 chars]
